Exact Columns: InvoiceNo, StockCode, Description, Quantity, InvoiceDate, UnitPrice, CustomerID, Country
Maps To Canonical: transactions: (id→InvoiceNo, date→InvoiceDate, product_id→StockCode, quantity→Quantity, unit_price→UnitPrice, customer_id→CustomerID); products: (id→StockCode, name→Description, unit_price→UnitPrice); customers: (id→CustomerID, name→Country)
Special Notes: Contains cancellations (InvoiceNo starting with 'C'), multi-country data

Exact Columns: orders.csv: (order_id, user_id, order_number, order_dow, order_hour_of_day, days_since_prior_order); products.csv: (product_id, product_name, aisle_id, department_id); order_products.csv: (order_id, product_id, add_to_cart_order, reordered)
Maps To Canonical: transactions: (id→order_id, customer_id→user_id, date→constructed from order_dow/hour); products: (id→product_id, name→product_name, category→department_id); RFM: (recency→days_since_prior_order, frequency→order_number)
Special Notes: Perfect for RFM analysis, market basket analysis, reorder prediction

Exact Columns: sales_train.csv: (item_id, dept_id, cat_id, store_id, state_id, d_1...d_1913); calendar.csv: (date, wm_yr_wk, weekday, wday, month, year, event_name_1, event_type_1, snap_CA/TX/WI); sell_prices.csv: (store_id, item_id, wm_yr_wk, sell_price)
Maps To Canonical: transactions: (product_id→item_id, quantity→d_X values, date→calendar.date); products: (id→item_id, category→cat_id); holidays_calendar: (date, event_name→event_name_1, type→event_type_1); price_changes: (product_id→item_id, price→sell_price)
Special Notes: Hierarchical time series (state/store/category/dept/item), SNAP benefits data, promotional events

Exact Columns: train.csv: (Store, DayOfWeek, Date, Sales, Customers, Open, Promo, StateHoliday, SchoolHoliday); store.csv: (Store, StoreType, Assortment, CompetitionDistance, CompetitionOpenSince[Month/Year], Promo2, Promo2Since[Year/Week], PromoInterval)
Maps To Canonical: transactions: (business_id→Store, date→Date, total_amount→Sales, quantity→Customers); businesses: (id→Store, type→StoreType); promotions: (business_id→Store, promo_type→Promo/Promo2, metadata→PromoInterval)
Special Notes: Competition distance data, multi-store chain, promotional intervals

Exact Columns: hotel, is_canceled, lead_time, arrival_date_year/month/day_of_month, stays_in_weekend_nights, stays_in_week_nights, adults, children, babies, meal, country, market_segment, distribution_channel, is_repeated_guest, previous_cancellations, previous_bookings_not_canceled, reserved_room_type, assigned_room_type, booking_changes, deposit_type, agent, company, days_in_waiting_list, customer_type, adr, required_car_parking_spaces, total_of_special_requests, reservation_status, reservation_status_date
Maps To Canonical: customers: (id→guest identifier, purchase_count→previous_bookings_not_canceled, is_repeated_guest); transactions: (date→arrival_date, total_amount→adr×nights); customer_churn: (churned→is_canceled, lead_time, previous_cancellations)
Special Notes: Perfect for churn/cancellation prediction, customer segmentation, RFM on booking patterns

Exact Columns: Product type, SKU, Price, Availability, Number of products sold, Revenue generated, Customer demographics, Stock levels, Lead times, Order quantities, Shipping times, Shipping carriers, Shipping costs, Supplier name, Location, Lead time, Production volumes, Manufacturing lead time, Manufacturing costs, Inspection results, Defect rates, Transportation modes, Routes, Costs
Maps To Canonical: product_inventory_events: (product_id→SKU, quantity→Stock levels, event_type→order/shipment); suppliers: (id→Supplier name, lead_time_days→Lead time); products: (id→SKU, name→Product type, current_stock→Stock levels)
Special Notes: End-to-end supply chain, includes logistics and quality control data

Exact Columns: TransactionID, CustomerID, CustomerName, CustomerEmail, CustomerAddress, ProductID, ProductName, ProductCategory, Quantity, Price, TotalAmount, PaymentMethod, PaymentStatus, TransactionDate, ShippingAddress, ShippingMethod, OrderStatus
Maps To Canonical: transactions: (id→TransactionID, customer_id→CustomerID, product_id→ProductID, quantity→Quantity, unit_price→Price, total_amount→TotalAmount, payment_method→PaymentMethod, date→TransactionDate); payment_events: (transaction_id→TransactionID, payment_method→PaymentMethod, status→PaymentStatus)
Special Notes: Complete e-commerce flow, multiple payment methods, order status tracking

Maps To Canonical: payment_events: (amount→Amount, status→Class, payment_date→Time); audit_logs: (action→transaction, metadata→V1-V28 features)
Special Notes: Highly imbalanced (0.172% fraud), PCA-transformed features for privacy

Exact Columns: Product ID, Product Name, Category, Unit, Quantity in Stock, Reorder Level, Supplier Name, Supplier Contact, Unit Cost, Selling Price, Expiry Date, Last Restocked Date, Sales Volume, Revenue
Maps To Canonical: products: (id→Product ID, name→Product Name, category→Category, unit_of_measure→Unit, current_stock→Quantity in Stock, reorder_point→Reorder Level, unit_price→Selling Price, supplier_id→Supplier Name); product_inventory_events: (product_id→Product ID, quantity→Sales Volume, timestamp→Last Restocked Date)
Special Notes: Includes reorder levels, expiry dates, supplier contacts

Exact Columns: train.csv: (id, date, store_nbr, family, sales, onpromotion); stores.csv: (store_nbr, city, state, type, cluster); oil.csv: (date, dcoilwtico); holidays_events.csv: (date, type, locale, locale_name, description, transferred)
Maps To Canonical: transactions: (id, date, product_id→family, quantity→sales); forecasts: (product_id→family, forecast_date→date, predicted_demand→sales); holidays_calendar: (date, event_name→description, type, region→locale_name); businesses: (id→store_nbr, type, location→city/state)
Special Notes: Ecuador stores, oil prices as external regressor, transferred holidays, earthquake impact
